.  Many visitors come to the area during the spring to see their favorite professional baseball team during Spring Training in the Cactus League.

Peoria is part of the Central West Valley of Arizona

The Central west region is partly a newly developed area and one that has been around for years. It has many hidden treasures and is a great place for families, singles or anyone who wants to come and enjoy the beautiful west valley. From hiking to shopping and eating to playing baseball, everyone can come out and discover this hidden jewel.

content=Watch performers in major Broadway productions such as a Christmas Carol, Cabaret, Guys and Dolls, Bye Bye Birdie and more! Enjoy dinner and a show with their dinner theatres. A great place for a date, a family (at select shows) or anyone looking to see a little theatre!

Beautiful view of the desert with the sparkling lake in between. Great for families with children of all ages.
, 16101 N. 83rd Ave. One main stadium and 12 practice fields. Can be rented for baseball tournaments, concerts, weddings, etc.

content= Full service Ice skating facility for hockey, figure skating and public use. Food and Merchandise Vendors on hand. A wonderful family environment. The public can join hockey and figure skating programs or come for free skate with purchase of entrance fee and skate rental.

content=Professional soccer team in the United Soccer League which plays it games at the Peoria Sports Complex. Their season operates from late March to early September.

content=Has a combination of BBQ and American food. Has a country home feel to it, decorated with antique furnishings with a large fireplace when you walk inside. It has spacious rooms that would easily accommodate large gatherings.
name=Satara Thai Cuisine and Wine Lounge

content=Fine-dining Thai food and eclectic wine lounge. High-end interior offering a separate private dining area equipped with a large TV, making the perfect spot for meetings. Just opened in September 2008.

content=Cuisine is Italian and Seafood. The restaurant has a very romantic feel to it, decorated to make you feel like you are eating in Italy. There is a full bar and private dining areas available to suit parties from 2 to 60.
content=Some of the best BBQ around

content=Has a blend of Mexican and American inspired dishes. The bright decor and large patio and bar make you feel like you are in Mexico. Great for a night out with friends. Inexpensive with daily drink specials.
